Name: Poly Fishing
About the game: Poly Fishing is a relaxing fishing game. You don't need to have a lot of fishing knowledge in real life. Just sit back, start fishing, and enjoy yourself! Key Features: Low poly style Keep fishing can raise fish's price Collect coins to increase fish's level Complete quest and reward useful skills Different terrain has different fishes Use your skills to catch special fishes
Meta Title: Poly Fishing: Aug 19, 2019, Kai Zou and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Poly Fishing? Check out the release date (Aug 19, 2019), developer insights from Kai Zou, and a complete game summary.
